channel.title: All clients crashing
channel.description:
Alright so whatever client i use i get the same error and i just crash if i just stand there nothing happens but if i move it crashes im using Windows 7 64Bit and i have the 64bit verson of JDK and JRE i also get this error code- [code] # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a566, pid=6088, tid=5932 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a566] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @auronx223 auronx223
item.description:
@auronx223 wrote:

installed java 32-bit and still dont work client’s run server.bat is

@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

loads up and able to log in but when i walk it just crashes client

edit:

tryed
@echo off
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javaw.exe” -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

works now

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Haha, no problem. I’ll check out the server, PM me it. I’m looking for a good one to play while Im bored.

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Dinko1 Dinko1
item.description:
@Dinko1 wrote:

Fission:

check client.java for like 127.0.0.1 and check for 43594 change it to your server and port, etc.

AHAHAHH lol nvm i used my brain and got my gui back with this

@echo off
start "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javaw.exe"
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Thanks to your sugg about the replaceing java and java aw i change that and also added that extra line for my gui and it worked!
Thanks! any time you feel like playing on my server just says so you’ll get an admin spot

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

check client.java for like 127.0.0.1 and check for 43594 change it to your server and port, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Dinko1 Dinko1
item.description:
@Dinko1 wrote:

Thanks but how would i change my server ip

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Okay. You can do this on any client.

In any run.bat, if it says Java, change “java” to this:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe"

if it says javaw, change it to this:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javaw.exe"

All this does, is when you use just Java, it goes straight to 64 bit. This one just points out the path to 32 bit java.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Dinko1 Dinko1

lol yeah um then how would i change the default server ip b/c its not my client ahah xD

item.description:

[quote=“Fission, post:7, topic:331865”] @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javaw.exe" -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
should do it. Make sure you get 32 bit java installed first though.[/quote]
Ill try that stay here if i get more probs

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Dinko1 Dinko1
item.description:
@Dinko1 wrote:

[quote=“Fission, post:3, topic:331865”]Actually. Go into your clients run.bat and change it from

java blahblahblah

to

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0

Just change that line.[/quote]
When i put it like that it wont even start the client
What is the correct way to line it up?
Im sort of a noob lol

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Actually. Go into your clients run.bat and change it from

java blahblahblah

to

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0

Just change that line.

Read full topic

item.title: All clients crashing
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Install x86 Java. Edit your RUn.Bat’s too:

@echo off
cd Files
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

Remember to change to right java version.

Read full topic
